content.rendered:
iPhone 12 Pro Max Repair Services

At MLG FIX, we offer expert repair services for your iPhone 12 Pro Max. From screen replacements to battery issues, our team is here to assist. Explore the common repairs we provide:

📱

Screen Repair

Cracked or unresponsive screen? We offer professional screen replacement services for the iPhone 12 Pro Max.

Get Started

🔋

Battery Replacement

Battery draining quickly or not holding a charge? We can replace your iPhone 12 Pro Max battery with a high-quality one.

Get Started

💧

Water Damage Repair

Accidentally dropped your iPhone 12 Pro Max in water? Our team specializes in assessing and repairing water damage.

Get Started

🔊

Speaker Repair

Experiencing sound issues with your iPhone 12 Pro Max? We can fix or replace the speaker to restore clear audio.

Get Started

🔌

Charging Port Repair

Charging problems? We offer reliable repair services for the charging port of your iPhone 12 Pro Max.

Get Started
